overview:
Computer science engineer by the University of Deusto and certified consultant in CRM solutions (Siebel and SalesForce.com).

He has worked as consultant at PriceWaterhouseCoopers, IBM Global Services and Microsoft Spain. Delegate of ALI for Navarra, Carlos is also owner of â€œForo Europeo Campus Empresarialâ€ (Pamplona) and founding partner of NTS (www.nts-solutions.com) and Doocuments. At the present time he is working as professor of postgraduate courses at the University of Deusto and Foro Europeo Campus Empresarial, combining these with the CEO role at NTS and Doocuments (www.doocuments.com).
